content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the command "list_files" to get a list of files in the current directory, which included "my_file.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: ', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)", "question": "What is Python?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an overview of the Python programming language, including its design philosophy, features, history, and implementations. Python is a high-level, general-purpose language known for its code readability and comprehensive standard library. It is widely used in various industries and has a strong community. The text provides information that can be used to understand the language and its features.\n\nLinks: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']", type='action_result')]
"""
